name: .BBSETTINGS
summary: Learn about .BBSETTINGS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To apply the settings a BBSETTINGS file contains in Blockbench (cross-platform):
In the Settings window, select Import Settings.
Navigate to and open your BBSETTINGS file.
Blockbench will then apply the settings your BBSETTINGS file contains.
Users who want to view or directly edit the JSON data a BBSETTINGS file contains can open the file in Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text or source code editor.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .bbsettings file in Blockbench
images.caption: BBSETTINGS file open in Blockbench
